title: Client Turns Black After Launching
body: My league Client turns black after I launch the application does anyone have a solution for this?

replies.body: If it's turning black and then crashing, there's a chance that it's due to a spotty network connection to our servers. Your patcher is staying black since it can't grab the information on which splash art it's supposed to display. Go over the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) so we can try and iron out those kinks.
